Psychological horror, starring Danielle Deadwyler, Peyton Jackson and Estella Kahiha

programme.title: Psycho Therapy: The Shallow Tale of a Writer Who Decided to Write About a Serial Killer
programme.desc: A writer befriends a retired serial killer in an attempt to find inspiration for his next novel and save his relationship. Covering as his marriage counsellor, the killer teaches him his methods as reality becomes deadlier than fiction. Comedy drama, starring Steve Buscemi, Britt Lower and John Magaro

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: A father and his two sons face off against terrifying creatures in a remote farmhouse. Director Benjamin Brewers dystopian horror thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Jaeden Martell and Maxwell Jenkins

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: A team of commandos enters a top-secret underground research facility when a deadly virus which turns victims into flesh-eating zombies is accidentally released. But their containment mission spins out of control as a rogue super-intelligent computer and hordes of the marauding undead wreak havoc. Sci-fi action horror, starring Milla Jovovich, Michelle Rodriguez and James Purefoy

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Zombie-fighting heroine Alice must battle her way through an entire city of the living dead in search of the scientist who created the zombie virus, in the hope of finding a way to stop it spreading further. Meanwhile, the corporation that employed him unleashes the product of its latest deadly genetic experiment on the city. Sci-fi horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich and Sienna Guillory

programme.title: Resident Evil: Extinction
programme.desc: Zombie-fighting heroine Alice comes out of hiding to protect a group of refugees in a post-apocalyptic wasteland overrun by the walking dead. Meanwhile, the sinister corporation that created the zombie virus is about to embark on its most dangerous experiment yet. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Oded Fehr and Ali Larter

programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Zombie-fighting heroine Alice roams the post-apocalyptic wasteland searching for human survivors. An encounter with an old friend leads her to a rumoured sanctuary in Los Angeles, but she discovers she has walked into a deadly trap and must once again battle the hordes of the living dead. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter and Wentworth Miller

programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: Zombie fighter Alice finds herself trapped in a top-secret underground base as a virus sweeps the world, turning the human race into the undead. She battles through the complex in search of those responsible for the outbreak and faces an old friend, now under the control of her enemies. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory and Michelle Rodriguez

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: The sheriff of a quiet little town investigates a series of unexpected murders, trying to work out what could have driven seemingly normal, well-adjusted people to kill. He discovers that a toxic chemical has turned many of the townsfolk into bloodthirsty maniacs, leaving those unaffected battling for survival. Horror remake, with Timothy Olyphant and Radha Mitchell

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The discovery of an ancient relic leads the Ghostbusters old and new to join forces to stop a second ice age. Supernatural comedy adventure sequel, starring Paul Rudd, Carrie Coon, Mckenna Grace and Finn Wolfhard

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: A palaeontologist, a game warden, a conspiracy theorist and a redneck sheriff each set out to investigate a mysterious death on the shore of a lake, only to find themselves up against a man-eating 30ft crocodile with an insatiable appetite. Comedy horror, starring Bill Pullman, Bridget Fonda, Oliver Platt, Brendan Gleeson and Betty White

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: A courier transports information in a microchip in his brain. On his latest assignment, he is pursued by various criminal, militant and corporate factions who will kill to get the data - and he only has 24 hours to deliver it before it destroys his mind. Sci-fi thriller based on a William Gibson short story, starring Keanu Reeves, Dolph Lundgren and Ice-T

programme.title: Escape from the 21st Century
programme.desc: In 1999, after discovering they have the power to travel in time with every sneeze, three friends embark on an adventure to save the world. Fantasy adventure, starring Ruoyun Zhang and Elane Zhong. In Chinese and Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: A journalist investigates several teenage deaths, which are linked to a cursed videotape and the rumour that anyone who watches it will die a week later. Her growing obsession with the tape endangers herself and her family - and to avoid the predicted fate, she has just seven days to find out where the recording came from. Gore Verbinskis remake of the Japanese supernatural horror, starring Naomi Watts, Martin Henderson and Brian Cox

programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: A group of college friends reunites for a hiking trip in Sweden. When one of them is injured, they are forced to make a risky detour through a forest during a rainstorm, which leads them into the clutches of a menacing presence stalking the woods. Horror based on Adam Nevills novel, starring Rafe Spall and Robert James-Collier

programme.title: The Secret of Marrowbone
programme.desc: A young man and his three siblings have kept the death of their beloved mother secret in order to remain together. However, they are plagued by a sinister presence in their sprawling manor. Writer/director Sergio G Sanchezs horror, starring George MacKay, Anya Taylor-Joy and Charlie Heaton

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Two small-time crooks kidnap the inventor of a highly intelligent law-enforcement robot. They force him to reprogram the android so it will help them carry out an audacious heist worth $200million, but in doing so, incur the wrath of a ruthless and corrupt general. Sci-fi thriller, starring Sharlto Copley, Hugh Jackman and Dev Patel

programme.title: Escape from the 21st Century
programme.desc: In 1999, after discovering they have the power to travel in time with every sneeze, three friends embark on an adventure to save the world. Fantasy adventure, starring Ruoyun Zhang and Elane Zhong. In Chinese and Mandarin, with English subtitles

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The discovery of an ancient relic leads the Ghostbusters old and new to join forces to stop a second ice age. Supernatural comedy adventure sequel, starring Paul Rudd, Carrie Coon, Mckenna Grace and Finn Wolfhard

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A psychiatrist wakes to find herself confined in the mental hospital where she once worked, accused of her husbands murder. Just when she thinks her situation could not get any worse, the spirit of a dead teenager begins to haunt her. Psychological horror, starring Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr, Penelope Cruz and Bernard Hill

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A gigantic monster of unknown origin rises from the sea and attacks New York. As the military throws everything they have at the creature to little effect, five survivors set off on a dangerous journey across the city to rescue a friend. One of the group documents their journey on a video camera, creating a first-hand record of the carnage. Found-footage thriller, starring Michael Stahl-David and Lizzy Caplan

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In a future blighted by mass infertility, the human race is one generation from extinction and the world has plunged into chaos. In a totalitarian Britain, a jaded former activist tries to protect the first woman to become pregnant in nearly 20 years. However, a militant underground group plans to use her for its own ends. Thriller, starring Clive Owen, Michael Caine and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A man buys his pregnant wife a vintage doll, which places their lives in jeopardy. Members of a Satanic cult have their eyes on the antique toy, and break into their house to prepare a ritual that will transform the harmless plaything into a terrifying monster. Horror spin-off from The Conjuring, starring Annabelle Wallis and Ward Horton

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer attempts to destroy vampires in a small American town. Horror based on Stephen Kings novel of the same name, starring Lewis Pullman, Makenzie Leigh, Jordan Preston Carter and Alfre Woodard

programme.title: Friendships Death
programme.desc: An android is sent to Earth by aliens on a diplomatic mission, and arrives in the middle of the the Jordanian Civil War of 1970. She forms a connection with a British reporter covering the conflict, and through him, hopes to learn to understand humanity. Sci-fi drama, starring Tilda Swinton and Bill Paterson

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killers enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. Thriller, starring Shailene Woodley, Ben Mendelsohn and Ralph Ineson

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agents nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersens thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA analyst gets caught up in the Colombian drug trade while trying to track down terrorists responsible for the murder of a close friend of the US president - but his investigations point to illegal activity and corruption at the very top of government. Action thriller, based on Tom Clancys novel, with Harrison Ford reprising his role from Patriot Games alongside Willem Dafoe, Anne Archer and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. The case is complicated by the reappearance of Holmes duplicitous old flame Irene Adler. Action thriller, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Rachel McAdams, Mark Strong and Eddie Marsan

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The detective investigates a series of seemingly unconnected crimes all around the world, and becomes convinced one man is behind them all - the elusive Professor Moriarty. He sets forth on an international journey to bring the evil mastermind to justice, but finds he is dealing with a foe who is his intellectual equal. Action thriller sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Noomi Rapace and Jared Harris

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: A series of interlinked stories about the Los Angeles underworld. A hitman plays minder to his bosss wife, and he and his partner deal with a dead body following a mishap with a gun. Meanwhile, a washed-up boxer goes on the run after refusing to throw a fight, and two lovers plot a hold-up in a diner. Quentin Tarantinos crime drama, starring John Travolta, Samuel L Jackson, Uma Thurman, Bruce Willis, Ving Rhames, Tim Roth and Amanda Plummer

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Four teenagers are sentenced to reform school after a prank results in the accidental death of an old man, and suffer sexual abuse at the hands of the guards. Years later, when the boys have grown up and begun to follow very different professions, a chance encounter with one of their abusers inspires them to plot revenge. Drama, starring Brad Pitt, Robert De Niro, Dustin Hoffman, Kevin Bacon, Jason Patric and Minnie Driver

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Federal agent Aaron Falk returns to his drought-stricken home town after an absence of more than 20 years to attend the funeral of his childhood friend. But his arrival opens up a decades-old wound - the unsolved death of a teenage girl. Crime drama, starring Eric Bana and Genevieve OReilly

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Manns thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The eccentric detective and his confidant Dr Watson investigate the apparent resurrection of a criminal mastermind with links to the occult, who is carrying out a series of seemingly magical murders. programme.desc: The detective investigates a series of seemingly unconnected crimes all around the world, and becomes convinced one man is behind them all - the elusive Professor Moriarty. He sets forth on an international journey to bring the evil mastermind to justice, but finds he is dealing with a foe who is his intellectual equal. Action thriller sequel, starring Robert Downey Jr, Jude Law, Noomi Rapace and Jared Harris

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective Dirty Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors disapproval. Don Siegels thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Following in the footsteps of brother Danny, light-fingered Debbie Ocean plans to steal the Toussaint, a $150million necklace from Vogues Met Gala, with the help of a famous actress. Crime caper, starring Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Anne Hathaway and Mindy Kaling

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: An assassination attempt is made on the life of the US president during a terrorism summit. The story unfolds from several perspectives, including that of the secret service agents charged with protecting the head of state, a news producer covering the event and a man in the crowd who may have caught the perpetrator on camera. Thriller, starring Dennis Quaid, Matthew Fox, Forest Whitaker, Sigourney Weaver and William Hurt

programme.title: Layer Cake
programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer is all set to leave the criminal world behind and start a new life abroad. However, his plans are thwarted when he is asked to track down a gangsters drug-addicted daughter and locate a stolen shipment of Ecstasy. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Michael Gambon, Colm Meaney, Kenneth Cranham and Sienna Miller

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish CIA researcher returns to his field office to find all his colleagues have been murdered in his absence. When he tries to uncover the truth, he also ends up targeted for assassination by his own agency, and is forced to go on the run to discover the reasons why. Sydney Pollacks thriller, starring Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson and Max von Sydow

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientists formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: A veteran gangster tries to reconnect with his kids and amend the mistakes of his past, but escaping from his nefarious former colleagues proves harder than expected. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Ron Perlman and Frankie Shaw

programme.desc: Neville confronts Jackie about loaning Dan money. Darlene attempts to play matchmaker for Mark

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: As Marks graduation approaches, he considers his relationship with his father. Louise plans a big graduation ceremony at the Lunch Box

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: A tragic turn of events forces working-class family the Conners to face the daily struggles of life in Lanford in a way they never have before. Sequel to classic comedy Roseanne, starring John Goodman and Laurie Metcalf

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: A TV appearance sees Spencer share airtime with a player he has an antagonistic history with, but it soon becomes a physical confrontation

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencers pill-popping is noticed by his doctor, while Vernon and Reggie talk money on a paintballing trip. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer is forced to deal with repercussions from Vernons injury, while also preventing his clients being poached by a rival financial manager. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: As Spencer and Andres rivalry intensifies, Vernons career hangs in the balance, and Jason visits the swamps for a potential new signing. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Spencer receives bad news from the doctor, Reggie looks to cheer Vernon up with an unusual pet, and Ricky bumps into an old flame

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Big tells Carrie he is engaged to Natasha. Miranda and Steve rekindle their relationship, Charlotte is reacquainted with an old friend and Samantha meets a man who exceeds her expectations. Comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis and Cynthia Nixon

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: While judging the fire departments calendar contest, Carrie meets a handsome politician and Samantha fulfils one of her fantasies. Elsewhere, Charlotte believes she has found her knight in shining armour. John Slattery guest stars alongside Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis and Cynthia Nixon

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: A politician lobbies Carrie for her affections despite their differing sexual tastes. Samantha meets a small but virile bachelor at a local bar, while Miranda and Steve negotiate new levels of commitment in their relationship

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie bumps into Bigs fiancee while shopping, and Samantha treats her friends to a days pampering at a health spa, where one of the male attendants is rumoured to give more than just a massage. Charlotte is initially hesitant to disrobe but does not regret making the effort

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Miranda behaves like a man in her relationship when she feels Steve is suffocating her. Carrie is shocked to discover her partner has had homosexual affairs in the past and Charlotte releases her masculine alter ego during a photo session. Guest starring Alanis Morissette and Eddie Cahill, with Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon and Kristin Davis

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.sub-title: The Kid Stays Out of the Picture

With contributions by friends and family, and including footage of a host of Hollywood legends

programme.title: Tina (2021)
programme.desc: Born Anna Mae Bullock in 1939, Tina Turner has sold in excess of 100 million records and earned numerous plaudits including Grammy awards and induction into the Rock And Roll Hall Of Fame with her first husband, Ike Turner. She was the first woman to grace the cover of Rolling Stone magazine and dabbled in acting including a memorable performance opposite Mel Gibson in Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome. Following a prolonged period of ill health, Turner intends to retire from the spotlight with her second husband, Erwin Bach. She bids farewell to her fans in the emotional documentary Tina. Directed by Dan Lindsay and TJ Martin, the film invites the singer to reminisce about her turbulent life and career with glowing contributions from friends, family and fans including Oprah Winfrey and Angela Bassett

programme.title: 27: Gone Too Soon
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the circumstances surrounding the deaths at 27 of Jimi Hendrix, Jim Morrison, Brian Jones, Janis Joplin, Kurt Cobain and Amy Winehouse

programme.title: Kurt Cobain: Montage of Heck
programme.desc: Filmmaker Brett Morgen explores the Nirvana frontmans childhood, career and tragic death, using material from the Cobains personal archives. Documentary, featuring Kurt Cobain

programme.title: Dogtown and Z-Boys
programme.desc: Documentary charting the history of skateboarding, from its 1970s emergence as a land-based form of surfing in Los Angeles and its subsequent explosion of popularity worldwide, to its current status as a widely-practised extreme sport. Narrated by Sean Penn, with contributions from experts Jay Adams and Tony Alva

programme.title: Lennox: The Untold Story
programme.desc: The incredible story of Lennox Lewis, who rose from humble beginnings in Londons West Ham to become regarded as one of the greatest heavyweight boxers of all time

programme.title: I Am Evidence
programme.desc: An investigation into the way sexual assault cases are handled by police departments across the United States. Documentary, directed by Trish Adlesic and Geeta Gandbhir

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: In 1984, a roll of film surfaced from an anonymous souce containing pictures of what is now known as the Eisenhower Briefing Document. Dating from 1952, it advised President-elect Dwight Eisenhower about the existence of a top-secret group of scientists, government officials and military personnel tasked with investigating reports of UFOs

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Of all the Hindu gods, none is more important than Shiva, the great destroyer. This programme contemplates whether the deity could have been the leader of an extraterrestrial race

programme.title: Commando Missions
programme.desc: The Heraklion Operation, carried out in June 1942. Major Georges Berges team landed in Crete and moved across land, intending destroy Luftwaffe planes at Heraklion airfield. They destroyed about 20 Ju 88s, but despite escaping from the airfield found their retreat betrayed

programme.title: Commando Missions
programme.desc: Operation Frankton, of December 1942. The mission was for Royal Marines to place limpet mines on German ships in the occupied Bordeaux Harbour, 62 miles along the Gironde River. Five cockleshell canoes set off from submarine HMS Tuna at the mouth of the river. Only two reached the harbour and carried out the raid, escaping with the aid of the French Resistance. The damage to the ships and the resulting disruption to German supply lines had a significant impact on the war effort

programme.title: WWIIs Most Daring Raids
programme.desc: The efforts of Norwegian resistance fighters to return to their invaded homeland to carry out a daring mission to raid and destroy a hydroelectric plant where the Germans were stockpiling a chemical needed for nuclear weapons research

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Dan Jones explores the turbulent history of six of Britains most famous castles, his journey commencing with a visit to Edinburgh Castle. A popular tourist attraction to this day, Dan explores the history of this famous stronghold that began as an Iron Age battle base and remains a military facility to this day, and was the target of the worlds first aerial bombing

programme.title: The Great British Dig: History in Your Back Garden
programme.desc: Hugh Dennis is joined by a team of expert archaeologists to excavate back gardens around Britain, uncovering the lost history buried beneath our lawns and flower beds. In the first episode, Hugh and the team attempt to uncover a Roman fort, connected to Hadrians Wall, that is buried beneath the back gardens of the quiet suburban streets of Benwell in Newcastle-upon-Tyne

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: The north of England is so rich in archaeological finds that Alice Roberts travels back there once again to reveal more of its fascinating history. programme.title: Alien Files: Unsealed

programme.title: WWIIs Most Daring Raids

programme.title: Walking Through History
programme.desc: Tony Robinson hikes up from Lyme Regis on Dorsets Jurassic Coast to the Somerset Levels in the footsteps of a ragtag rebel army led by the young Duke of Monmouth, the illegitimate son of Charles II. He sailed in from Holland around Lymes famous Cobb with a handful of soldiers, believing the people would support him in overthrowing the newly crowned James II, who was also Monmouths uncle, but, more importantly, Roman Catholic. The year was 1685 and the country was riven by anti-Catholic feeling mixed up with revolutionary zeal. Monmouth marched through the fiercely independent towns of Devon, gathering support from artisans and farmworkers. Meeting up with Billy Bragg in Colyton, Tony learns about the kind of people prepared to risk their lives for the Monmouth Rebellion

programme.title: The Great British Dig: History in Your Back Garden

programme.title: Royal Murder Mysteries

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Dan Jones explores the history of York Castle, built on the orders of William the Conqueror and once the regional seat of British government. The castle has also been used as a prison and a royal mint, and in 1308, 25 Knights Templar were jailed there and examined on charges of heresy, idolatry and other crimes. The castle was also where Dick Turpin was held prior to his execution in 1739 and Dan tries to separate fact from fiction regarding the many myths to have developed about the infamous highwayman

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Dan Jones explores the 900-year history of Leeds Castle in Kent, from its origins as a royal Saxon familys manor and Norman stronghold to the private property of six medieval queens, a Tudor palace, a Jacobean country house and a Georgian mansion. Its last owner, Lady Olive Baillie, made it a centre of lavish hospitality for leading politicians, international royalty and film stars. When she died in 1974, she bequeathed the castle and grounds to a specially created charitable trust so that future generations could enjoy her home

programme.sub-title: Unrepentant: The SS and Its Myth After 1945
programme.desc: The myth of the SS has lived on after 1945. Many Nazi perpetrators fled to exile unscathed with the help of the Vatican or the US intelligence services. programme.desc: Documentary visiting some of the most remote, cold and inhospitable places on the planet to reveal great mysteries that have been frozen in time. programme.desc: Scientists explore how Earth would transform if humans vanished, here considering how the global retail machine would collapse. Shipping lanes would turn explosive and ghostly grocery stores become battlefields for rodents and predators

programme.title: Kevin Costners The West
programme.desc: The Fetterman Fight, also known as the Fetterman Massacre. In 1866 Wyoming, a group of infantry, cavalry, and civilians under the command of Captain William Fetterman was wiped out by thousands of Native warriors of the Lakota Sioux, Northern Cheyenne, and Arapaho tribes. The site of the battle was Fort Phil Kearney, one of many forts along the Bozeman Trail, built to connect settlers to gold mines out West

programme.title: Digging Up Britains Past
programme.desc: Helen Skelton and Alex Langlands explore the history of Stonehenge, examining the stones that make up the structure, their acoustic properties, and how they were transported 120 miles from their origins in Salisbury Plain to form the circle. Helen also visits a village where builders were believed to have lived during the sites construction and meets scientists who have analysed the bodies buried beneath the monument, including the remains of a man who is believed to have come to Stonehenge all the way from Switzerland

programme.title: Digging Up Britains Past
programme.desc: Helen Skelton and Alex Langlands, along with a team of archeologists, explore fascinating periods in British history through a current archaeological dig. In the first episode, Helen and Alex head for the island of Lindisfarne, where archaeologists are trying to locate the site of an eighth-century monastery. Among their finds is a graveyard and a number of skeletons, which may be those of both monks and pilgrims

programme.title: Digging Up Britains Past
programme.desc: In 1592, Elizabeth I visited Sudeley Castle in the Cotswolds for a three-day party commemorating the nations victory over the Spanish Armada. Here, Raksha Dave, Alex Langlands and assorted volunteers and archaeologists hunt for a lost garden planted as part of the celebrations, while there is also a visit to Kenilworth Castle to investigate an Elizabethan garden still in full bloom today. Plus, a look at how the gardens Tudor owner, Robert Dudley transformed his estate to win favour with his Queen

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Dan Jones heads to the south-east of England to explore the turbulent history of Dover Castle. He reveals that Henry II ordered its construction not only as a statement of royal power, but also out of guilt for the murder of Thomas Becket, the Archbishop of Canterbury, in 1170. Dan discovers how a vast network of tunnels was used to defend the castle, including underground barracks built during the Napoleonic Wars and a nuclear bunker created during the Cold War

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Dan Jones explores the turbulent history of the Tower of London, which is one of Britains most famous buildings and has been a military fortress, a palace, a royal mint, a prison, a zoo and a place of execution. He reveals how one kings obsession with money led to the Tower becoming the focus of the worst Jewish massacre the country had ever seen and explains how a mob of disgruntled peasants managed to break through its defences as they sought bloody revenge for taxes they could no longer put up with

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Dan Jones explores the history of Warwick Castle, which started as a motte and bailey fort established by William the Conqueror in 1068 and was transformed into a stone fortress two centuries later by the Beauchamp family. He examines the role Guy Beauchamp played in the kidnapping and murder of one of Edward IIs closest allies and descends into the castles claustrophobic dungeon

programme.title: Secrets of Great British Castles
programme.desc: Dan Jones heads to Gwynedd to explore the history of Caernarfon Castle, the building of which began in 1283 on the orders of Edward I. He demonstrates how the castles vast stone walls and strategically designed towers repelled all enemies, even the Welsh national hero Owain Glyndwr, earning itself a truly forbidding reputation, but its military importance faded at the end of the 15th century when Henry Tudor - a Welshman - made his way on to the English throne

programme.title: The Abyss: Rise and Fall of the Nazis
programme.desc: The defeat at Stalingrad in 1943, which was the turning point of the Second World War and convinced the Nazi leadership to intensify their terror and propaganda campaigns

programme.title: The Abyss: Rise and Fall of the Nazis
programme.desc: A fresh look at the Third Reich from a global and current perspective, telling how the Nazis conquered Germany and then half of Europe within a few years of losing the First World War. programme.title: Royal Autopsy
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts explores the final dying days and ultimate cause of death of Englands Usurper King, Henry IV. Working with forensic pathologist Dr Brett Lockyer, they conduct an as real post mortem exam on the dead king

programme.title: Royal Autopsy
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts delves into the life and death of Anne, Queen of England from 1702 to 1714. Being the last Stuart monarch and getting pregnant at least 17 times. Despite her remarkable fecundity, Queen Anne was not able to produce an heir as most of her pregnancies resulted in miscarriages or stillbirths and none of the live births survived beyond childhood. She suffered from gout for much of her life - so much so, that she even had to be carried to her coronation at Westminster Abbey. The gout rendered her largely immobile in her latter years

programme.title: Witches of Essex
programme.desc: Rylan and Alice Roberts visit Manningtree, the focal point for the 1645 witch hunt where self-appointed Witchfinder General Matthew Hopkins orchestrated the persecution of many women accused of witchcraft. He terrorised those accused with brutal Puritan zeal and torture

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: The veteran naturalist examines the world of flight, travelling across the globe to chart the evolutionary story of those creatures who seemingly defy the rules of gravity by taking to the air. Initially focusing on insects, Attenborough meets a descendant of the dragonfly, before examining the Atlas beetle, which tends to restrict flight to times when it needs a mate or a fresh supply of food. More aesthetically pleasing is a group of beautiful tropical butterflies, followed by an in-depth study into the blow fly - the jet fighter of insects

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: The veteran naturalist visits the jungles of Borneo to meet creatures that like to glide through life - the harlequin tree frog and the little-known colugo - often referred to, incorrectly, as a flying lemur. He also has a CGI-assisted encounter with the first true vertebrate flyer, the pterosaur, receives a flying lesson from a small flock of swans at Loch Lomond in Scotland and encounters the planets largest species of bat

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Conquest of the Skies
programme.desc: The veteran naturalist turns his attention to creatures that dominate the skies today. He begins with the vast bird family, watching a group of vultures as they go scavenging and some peregrine falcons dive bombing for their prey. He then moves on to the floating forests of Ecuador to find out what makes the humble hummingbird tick, before ending his journey at the Gomantong bat caves of Borneo - a place he first filmed in 1972 - witnessing a mass exodus of the creatures

programme.desc: After wreaking havoc in a department store, Bart is sent to a juvenile detention centre, where he meets fellow tearaway Gina - who helps him plot his escape. With the guest voice of Sarah Michelle Gellar

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of staff at the RSPCA hospital in Brisbane, with one vet giving a koala mouth-to-mouth resuscitation, while another performs microsurgery on a fruit bat. A bath-averse python faces its fears and an owl is rescued

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: The team work out solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat while one vet works to solve a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend

programme.title: Gillette Labs Soccer Saturday: Build-Up
programme.desc: Build-up to the Saturday football across the country, with all the latest team news and analysis ahead of the days games from Simon and the team.

programme.title: Gillette Labs Soccer Saturday
programme.desc: Reports on the afternoons football up and down the country as goals go in and updates arrive in the studio from around the grounds

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer becomes a masked vigilante, taking revenge on local wrongdoers by throwing pies at them. Unfortunately, it is not long before Mr Burns discovers his secret - and tries to exploit it by ordering him to target the Dalai Lama. With the voice of original Star Trek cast member Nichelle Nichols

programme.title: Iconic Combat Machines
programme.desc: How the Messerschmitt Me 109 aircraft and M4 Sherman tank - two of the most produced combat machines in the Second World War - managed to stay relevant until the end of the conflict through constant modernisation and new variants

programme.title: Secrets in the Dark
programme.desc: Documentary shedding light on unusual discoveries made in the darkest places on Earth. This episode focuses the fairy coffins - 17 miniature coffins containing carved figures, discovered in 1836 on Arthurs Seat, Edinburgh, with their exact purpose remaining a mystery. Plus, how the 1717 wreck of Black Sam Bellamys pirate ship Whydah Gally yielded treasure, skeletons and new insights into the hidden world of piracy from its watery grave off Massachusetts

programme.title: Portrait Artist of the Year
programme.sub-title: Melvin Odoom, Max Beesley, Emily Atack
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan invites nine artists to paint celebrity sitters Melvin Odoom, Max Beesley and Emily Atack as Tai Shan Schierenberg, Kathleen Soriano and Kate Bryan judge the efforts

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Kingdom of Plants
programme.desc: The naturalist and film-maker explores the many varieties of plant life housed at the Royal Botanic Gardens in Kew, west London, and explains what they reveal about the natural world and the development of life on Earth. He begins inside the establishments Palm House, whose climate has been engineered to simulate conditions found in rainforests, charting the evolution of plants that grow in the worlds wettest regions and investigating how flowering plants spread across the globe so rapidly

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: Never Mind the Buzzcocks

programme.title: Cannonball
programme.desc: Andrew Flintoff hosts the action-packed game show, in which 24 contestants are tasked with traversing a series of water-based challenges and custom-made inflatable obstacles, each designed to test their speed, accuracy, height and distance. The most successful contestants then claim a chance to launch themselves cannonball-style at a moving target on the surface of a deep-water tank, all in the hope of nabbing the shows priceless Cannonball Cup. Frankie Bridge, Radzi Chinyanganya, Ryan Hand and Maya Jama all join Andrew at the poolside to commentate on the action

programme.title: Guy Martins Great British Power Trip
programme.desc: As an energy crisis and cost of living crisis collide, the Lincolnshire lorry mechanic and motorcycle racer investigates the past, present and future of British power stations to work out how the country makes its most valuable commodity of all - electricity. This first episode begins with Guy testing every piece of equipment in his workshop to find out which items use the most electricity. Horrified by what hes now having to pay for power, he tries to work out the reasons behind his big bills, and visits his local power station at Drax - which also happens to be the countrys biggest

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: The actor casts off in China, where fishing is a very important skill. At Qiandao Lake in Zhekiang, he joins 100 locals in trying to land a bighead carp and samples the revered catch. More culinary experiences await as a result of Robsons hunt for octopus, and he tries his hand at cormorant fishing - but has trouble restraining his birds constant efforts to escape

programme.desc: Host Rob Brydon and captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack welcome Angellica Bell, Bob Mortimer, Suggs and Holly Willoughby to the comedy panel show on which the teams reveal extraordinary stories about themselves. But are they telling the truth, or are they making it all up?

programme.title: Would I Lie to You?
programme.desc: Singer Sophie Ellis-Bextor, actress Briony May Williams and comedians Loyiso Gola and Jason Manford join host Rob Brydon and regular captains David Mitchell and Lee Mack on the comedy panel show. As usual, the participants set out to hoodwink their opponents with absurd facts and plausible fibs about themselves in a bid to secure a team victory, through rounds such as Home Truths and Quick-fire Lies

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Fortune smiles on Mike and Alison when a TV company comes calling, looking for an old house in which to film a period drama. But to get the money in the bank, Alison must ensure the shoot goes without a hitch despite the horde of curious ghosts, the houses crumbling floorboards and her crippling crush on the shows lead actor. Meanwhile, Thomas and Lady Button learn the meaning of a free pass, and Julian tries his luck at betting on horse racing. Comedy, starring Charlotte Ritchie, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Simon Farnaby

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: Learning that their posh neighbours the Beg-Chetwyndes have an ancient claim over their land, Mike and Alison throw an upmarket dinner party to help resolve a thorny issue. But with the ghosts her only guide to high-class decorum, the evening starts badly and only gets worse - thanks to Marys woeful catering, Mikes clueless deal-making and Robins raucous celebration of the lunar eclipse. Elsewhere, the spooks become obsessed with a TV sitcom. Comedy, guest starring Geoff McGivern and Sophie Thompson

programme.title: Ghosts
programme.desc: A luxury hotel chain makes penniless and exhausted couple Mike and Alison an offer they cant refuse, but the prospect of their departure drives a wedge between the ghosts, and the hardline Captain finds himself ostracised, while Pat is voted in as reluctant leader. As the clueless spirits brainstorm money-making schemes, the Captain takes matters into his own hands. Meanwhile, fortune smiles on Headless Humphrey in his ceaseless search for his errant body

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: As Lee Mack brings the popular sitcom to an end, a chance to see some of the unintentionally comic moments during filming that ended up on the cutting-room floor

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Seven years into their marriage, Lee and Lucy face the daily onslaught of raising Charlie and his twin siblings, five-year-olds Benji and Molly. Lovably feckless father Frank remains around and close friends including world-weary Toby and uptight ice-queen Anna are still on the scene. Thankfully, Lucys more dependable parents Geoffrey and Wendy can be relied upon when the going gets tough. However, while juggling the ongoing needs of those around him, the pair disagree about the best way to keep the romance alive. Comedy, starring Lee Mack and Sally Bretton

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lucy offends father-in-law Frank by casting doubt on his ability to mind the children while she and Lee enjoy an evening out at the ballet. Sally Bretton co-stars, alongside veteran comedy performer Bobby Ball and Outnumbereds Hugh Dennis

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie discovers Ron secretly goes on a hunting trip every year, and decides to invite herself and the rest of her colleagues along. programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie is horrified to learn Tom is getting divorced, and urges his colleagues to offer their support. However, her suspicions are aroused when he seems strangely cheerful about the split. Meanwhile, Andy makes a ham-fisted attempt to undermine Mark and Anns relationship

programme.title: Parks and Recreation
programme.desc: Leslie accidentally becomes the subject of a tabloid scandal after being pictured talking to notoriously promiscuous councillor Bill Dexhart - who does not seem particularly interested in helping to clear her name. programme.desc: A car in which a teacher was murdered five years earlier is returned to its owner - the victims husband. Detective drama, starring Amanda Redman, James Bolam, Dennis Waterman and Alun Armstrong

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: The team is asked to reinvestigate the 1975 death of a union leader, whose body was found in the Thames. Starring Graham Cole, Gemma Craven and Samantha Bond

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: New arrival DC Kerry Holmes finds herself partnered with DS Boulton, who makes it clear that he doesnt have a high opinion of female detectives. Its back to business when a young woman with Downs syndrome is brought in feeling unwell. To everyones surprise, they discover she is six months pregnant, causing some of them to think the worst, and the staff are joined by new nurse Patsy, whose sense of humour and no-nonsense attitude make her an instant hit

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Trixie is chuffed when local curate Tom invites her to join him for a day of cricket, sending her to work with a spring in her step. Is love on the cards for the young midwife? Shelaghs infertility has made her think long and hard about what she wants in life, so she approaches her husband with an idea, while Patsy upsets a young mother in the clinic and is moved to the district rota, where she works tirelessly to diagnose a dockers unusual symptoms

programme.title: Catherine Cooksons The Secret
programme.desc: Feature-length dramatisation of the writers only thriller, set in 19th-century Tyneside. Colin Buchanan stars as successful businessman Freddie Musgrave, who has worked hard for 20 years to live down his misspent youth as runner to a gang of smugglers and is shocked when a face appears from long ago, threatening to reveal the details of his sordid past. With Clare Higgins and June Whitfield

programme.title: Last Tango in Halifax
programme.desc: Alan and Celias disappearance has everyone in a panic, so a search party is organised, and when Gillian and Caroline come together in their shared concern, the future step-sisters forge a new bond. Meanwhile, oblivious to all the fuss they have caused, the elderly lovebirds are locked in the spooky Southowram Hall - but while she is worried ghosts are present, he is secretly concerned about chest pains. Sally Wainwrights drama, starring Derek Jacobi, Anne Reid, Sarah Lancashire and Nicola Walker

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: CC Lowsley is totally preoccupied with his upcoming amateur production of The Cursed Arrow. When an actor in the company is murdered, Sister Boniface uncovers a historical motive. Drama, starring Lorna Watson

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. The team is baffled by the conflicting possible motives after two women are shot dead in a house basement - and the investigation isnt helped by Jack having to work alongside an old flame, the ambitious DI Chrissy Reed. Meanwhile, Leo faces a difficult choice when he is asked to prove his pathologist mentor made a mistake in a case that resulted in a mother being imprisoned for smothering her baby to death. Emilia Fox, William Gaminara and David Caves star

programme.title: Gunpowder
programme.desc: Following the death of Elizabeth I, King James of Scotland claims the English throne, and the country goes to war with Catholic Spain. As a result, English Catholics are persecuted and driven into hiding, but after witnessing the brutal means by which the Crown intends to punish his people for practicing their faith, recusant Catholic Robert Catesby devises a treasonous plot to assassinate King James. However, he must first enlist the aid of stalwart allies, and heads to Brussels to seek the help of a hardened war veteran named Guy Fawkes. Three-part historical drama, starring Kit Harington as Catesby - his own ancestor - alongside Liv Tyler, Mark Gatiss, Derek Riddell and Tom Cullen

programme.title: Gunpowder
programme.desc: The Kings network of spies begins to close the net around the Catholic conspirators, and while Catesby and Wintour seek to recruit more allies to their cause in mainland Europe, Lord Cecil puts the pressure on Lady Anne to reveal her cousins whereabouts. On their return to London, the plotters convene for the first time, and decide their moment to strike must be November 5, at the opening of Parliament. However, they must first secure gunpowder, and when a threat of detection leads to a bloody clash, Catesby puts his life on the line in an all-or-nothing mission at the Tower of London. Historical drama, starring Kit Harington, Liv Tyler and Mark Gatiss

programme.title: Gunpowder
programme.desc: November 4th arrives, and with state opening looming on the horizon, Catesby and his co-conspirators load the tunnels below Parliament with barrels of gunpowder. Across the city, Father Garnet faces pressure from an ally to break his seal of confession and reveal the plot to the authorities - for the good of the already-oppressed Catholic faith. However, should the priest prove to be steadfast in his support of the would-be assassins, Lord Cecil may yet have another means by which to end Catesbys mission. Historical drama, starring Kit Harington, Mark Gatiss, Liv Tyler and Peter Mullan

programme.desc: Rik Mayall and Adrian Edmondson star in a stage show based on the comedy series, in which toilet humour is rife as the duo find themselves stranded on a Pacific island

programme.desc: Animation looking at the impact the Wise Owl public information films from the 1970s had on young people, told through the eyes of Ronnie, who has spent his entire life trying to do the right thing. Starring Steve Pemberton and Reece Shearsmith

programme.title: The Power of Parker
programme.desc: Diane puts her trust in Kath, sending her on a covert mission to Martins office while she reluctantly accompanies her spouse to a dinner party at Sandy Coopers home. In a desperate attempt to address his financial woes, Martin tries to impress Sandy and Vinnie Hayes to secure the treasury job and get his hands on the Rotary Club float. Comedy written by and starring Sian Gibson, with Conleth Hill and Rosie Cavaliero

programme.title: The Power of Parker
programme.desc: Its the big day for Kath and Diane as they attempt to finally exact their revenge on Martin. However, while Diane has never felt more alive, Kath seems to be having second thoughts. Comedy, written by and starring Sian Gibson, with Rosie Cavaliero, Conleth Hill, Sheila Reid and Steve Pemberton

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: Lucys worries about the age gap between her and Guy increase when he turns up with his grandson. A family emergency means Lee and Tim are left in charge of the youngster, but their babysitting skills leave a lot to be desired. Sitcom, starring Lee Mack and Sally Bretton

programme.title: The Cockfields
programme.desc: Simon is persuaded to mark the occasion of his 40th birthday back at the Cockfield family home, so takes his girlfriend Donna along to the Isle of Wight. The duo soon find themselves spending a long weekend as guests of his ever-doting mother Sue and controlling stepfather Ray, together with their menagerie of relatives and friends. Comedy, starring Joe Wilkinson, Diane Morgan, Sue Johnston and Bobby Ball

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotter brothers are guests at a wedding, where they are intrigued to hear their dear departed mother inherited the ill-gotten gains of an East End bank robber - but nobody has ever found the loot. Christmas special of the long-running comedy, originally shown in 1987, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield, with a guest appearance by Joan Sims

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del is invited to a school reunion at the Nags Head organised by old adversary Roy Slater (Jim Broadbent), who has recently been released from prison and claims to have turned over a new leaf. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Tessa Peake-Jones

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: He Aint Heavy, Hes My Uncle
programme.desc: Uncle Albert falls victim to muggers, so Del-Boy resolves to take the law into his own hands, while Rodney becomes a director in Trotters Independent Traders - and his first job is to give the car a good clean. Comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Three Men, a Woman and a Baby
programme.desc: Rodney and Albert begin to worry the flat will get overcrowded as the birth of Del-Boy Jr approaches, while Del feels well prepared for fatherhood thanks to a stint at antenatal classes with Raquel. Starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotters go on a lads day out to Margate with their mates, but things do not go as expected when their bus blows up, leaving them stranded overnight in the seaside town. Finding a room in the hotel from hell, the brothers are only too happy to go out and sample the local nightlife - and thats when Del-Boy gets a blast from the past. Feature-length Christmas special from 1989, starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: The Trotters embark on a venture involving the decoration of Denzils flat. When they find his wifes beloved canary lying dead in its cage, they assume responsibility and race to replace it before the deal is ruined. Comedy, with David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del and Rodneys Christmas celebrations are disrupted by the unexpected arrival of their estranged father - leaving the brothers doubtful they can trust him after such a long absence. Another chance to see the 1983 festive special of John Sullivans comedy

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom considers leaving Surbiton to live on a farm, and the couple receive help with their pigs from a passing boar-walker. Sitcom, starring Richard Briers, Felicity Kendal, Penelope Keith and Paul Eddington

programme.desc: Tom and Barbaras visits to evening classes become unusually productive, while Margo struggles to master pottery. Comedy, starring Felicity Kendal and Richard Briers

programme.title: The Cockfields
programme.desc: Saturday finds everyone visiting Aunty Rose in the nursing home so she can give Simon a somewhat unorthodox birthday present, while Simon and Donna reluctantly join the family to see Alan Titchmarshs new house. Later, on a cliff top walk, David updates the family on his disastrous love life, and Sue confides in Simon that theyre thinking of moving as the house is feeling too big. Comedy, starring Joe Wilkinson, Diane Morgan, Sue Johnston and Bobby Ball

programme.title: The Cockfields
programme.desc: Sunday finds preparations for Simons 40th birthday in full swing - amid much stress levels. Larry arrives with a very hungover Melissa, who immediately disrupts proceedings. After an awkward lunch its present time and Larry gives Simon a red leather jacket which, to Rays delight, looks ridiculous on him. Eventually Melissa joins the party, but rejects Sues food. Simon tries to defend his fathers behaviour to Ray and an argument ensues until David drops a bombshell that makes Simons birthday one hell never forget. Comedy, starring Joe Wilkinson, Diane Morgan, Sue Johnston and Bobby Ball

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Part two of two. The evidence of the videotape convinces Karen Parks her husband has been abusing their daughter. CID arrest him on suspicion of murder, but CCTV footage from an off licence provides him with a cast-iron alibi for the time of Chloes death and he is released without charge. Wills persistence leads to a tense encounter and Callum resorts to desperate measures to ensure justice is served. Chris Walker guest stars

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Phils latest conquest Monica Dreyfuss reports a burglary at her home which has left her bruised, shaken and fearing for her life. A series of beatings on a local estate points to a vigilante campaign against trouble-making drug dealers and the case touches a nerve with Will as he struggles to get over Martin Parks suicide. Michael Brandon and Anna Wing guest star

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: A masked kidnapper threatens to kill Monica if Phil does not return with the money Louis Dreyfuss owes his boss. Samantha is shocked to learn of his involvement in the case but allows her old partner to carry on with his undercover operation to the point of handing over the money - not realising Phils philandering ways have made him more than one new enemy. Michael Brandon guest stars

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: An abandoned car leads Callum and Will to a woman caught up in a tragic love triangle in which jealousy explodes into violence as the aggrieved husband stabs his rival and then threatens to kill himself. Meanwhile, a man trying to obtain his birth certificate at a register office discovers his identity has been stolen, alerting Sally and Tony to an extensive benefit fraud scam. Emma Samms and Stephen McGann guest star

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: The anger and frustration caused by the Martin Parks suicide boils over when Will corners an arrogant young thief at the top of a block of flats and holds him over the edge of the balcony. Emma and Nikki answer a call to a domestic affray when a man suspects his wife of conducting a cyber affair and beats up his supposed rival

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: Ambulance Australia
programme.desc: Paramedics Jeff and Tamara race to help an elderly man who has flipped his mobility scooter, while another patient has stopped breathing after overdosing on heroin

programme.title: Ambulance Australia
programme.desc: Armahn and Ash help a 20-year-old man who has been hit by a van while on his electric scooter, while Shane and Shelly assist a woman suffering with pain in her breast

programme.title: Ambulance Australia
programme.desc: Critical care paramedics Andrew and John race to help two people involved in a severe motorbike accident., while the operation centres deal with a high volume of emergency calls

programme.title: Ambulance Australia
programme.desc: Advanced paramedics Lucy and Eliza come to the aid of a motorcyclist who has been hit by a taxi, while Shane and Shelly race to help a three-month-old baby.

programme.title: Pete Wicks: For Dogs Sake
programme.sub-title: Hugo and the Ice Cream Pups
programme.desc: Pete meets some newborn pups fighting to survive, and helps teach Hugo, a Cane Corso rescued from quarantine at Dover, how to be a dog

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Noel Fitzpatrick faces one of his greatest practical and ethical challenges yet when hes introduced to Hermes, a tortoise with only one good leg. Can he provide Hermes with three prosthetic feet, using tiny titanium implants? Meanwhile, a rottweiler called Dave urgently needs an upgrade to his previous hip replacements

programme.title: One Born: What Happened Next?
programme.desc: Documentary revisiting some of One Born Every Minutes most memorable parents, including Lucy as she plans to pursue her goal of returning to professional opera singing two years after the birth of her third child. Kirri and Brendan are looking to recapture their youthful spark following the delivery of their second born. Plus, Detroit-born Shannon and her Yorkshire husband Chris try to combine the best of both worlds as they raise their two children

programme.title: One Born: What Happened Next?
programme.desc: Documentary revisiting some of One Born Every Minutes most memorable parents, including young couple Dan and Kerry who have responded to the challenges of parenthood in different ways. While Dan has embraced becoming a dad, Kerry has had to deal with an identity crisis. Plus, a chance to catch up with Marvin, whose long-distance job meant he nearly missed the birth of his daughter, and Dawn and Paul who, despite already having children from previous marriages, wanted to add to their family

programme.title: Ambulance Australia
programme.desc: A look at the busiest ambulance service in Sydney. Paramedics go to a warehouse where a forklift has rolled over and face a car accident where a pregnant womans waters have broken

programme.title: Ambulance Australia
programme.desc: Its the weekend and a rookie paramedic faces a confronting case, a young boy is trapped seizing in a bathroom, and a stranger must be convinced to perform lifesaving CPR

programme.title: DNA Family Secrets
programme.desc: Stacey Dooley meets five sisters in Lancashire who only found each other as adults. They know they all share the same mother, but want to find out if they also have the same father. Luke was a sperm donor as a university student in the late 1980s. He has now come forward to find out if any potential children might be looking for him. Identical twins Diane and Louise want to test their DNA to discover if they both carry the potentially deadly BRCA genetic mutation since they lost their mother to cancer

programme.title: Simply Nigella
programme.desc: Food writer Nigella Lawson shares the origins of some of her ideas, revealing just how and why they came into being, including a bowl of steamed clams with Thai basil inspired by a holiday in Thailand. Her toasty olive oil granola was born out of a need to have a satisfying breakfast at the ready, while hunger pangs at the other end of the day led to a dish of griddled halloumi with a sweet chilli sauce. Finally, Nigellas friends are treated to a supper of griddled bavette steak, followed by a lemon pavlova
